document.full_text: minnesota left-hander francisco liriano pitched the first no-hitter of the major league baseball season on tuesday to give the twins a 1-0 win over the chicago white sox.
document.title: twins' liriano pitches no-hitter against white sox
lines_and_colors: minnesota left-hander francisco liriano pitched the first no-hitter of the major league baseball season on tuesday to give the twins a 1-0 win over the chicago white sox.
